<div id="guidelines_content" class="guidelines_content_lightbox" style="display:none;">
<p class="headline">Booking.com Guest Review Guidelines</p>
<i>To keep the rating score and review content relevant for your upcoming trip, we archive reviews older than 24 months.</i>
<p>Only a customer who has booked through Booking.com and stayed at the property in question can write a review. This allows us to verify that our reviews come from real guests like you. Who better to tell others about the free breakfast, friendly staff, or their comfortable room than someone who’s stayed at the property?</p>
<p>We want you to share your story, with both the good and the not-so-good. All we ask is that you follow a few simple guidelines.</p>
<p class="head"><strong>Reviews Vision</strong></p>
<p>We believe review contributions and property responses will highlight a wide range of opinions and experiences, which is critical in helping guests make informed decisions about where to stay.</p>
<p class="head"><strong>Reviews Principles</strong></p>
<p>Contributions to Booking.com are a reflection of the dedication of our guests and properties, so we treat them with the utmost respect.</p>
<p>Whether negative or positive, we'll post every comment in full and as quickly as possible, provided the guidelines are met. We'll also provide transparency over the status of submitted content.</p>
<p>We'll use the same guidelines and standards for all user-generated content, and for the property responses to that content.</p>
<p>We'll allow the contributions to speak for themselves, and we won’t be the judge of reality. Booking.com’s role is to be a feedback distributor for both guests and properties.</p>
<p class="head"><strong>Guidelines and Standards for Reviews</strong></p>
<p>These guidelines and standards aim to keep the content on Booking.com relevant and family-friendly, without limiting expression or strong opinions. They're also applicable regardless of the comment's tone. </p>
<p><strong>Contributions should be travel related.</strong> The most helpful contributions are detailed and help others make better decisions. Please don’t include personal, political, ethical, or religious commentary. Promotional content will be removed and issues concerning Booking.com’s services should be routed to our Customer Service or Accommodation Service teams.</p>
<p><strong>Contributions should be appropriate for a global audience.</strong> Please avoid using profanity or attempts to approximate profanity with creative spelling, in any language. Comments and media that include hate speech, discriminatory remarks, threats, sexually explicit remarks, violence, or the promotion of illegal activity are not permitted. </p>
<p><strong>All content should be genuine and unique to the guest.</strong> Reviews are most valuable when they are original and unbiased. Your contribution should be yours. Booking.com property partners should not post on behalf of guests or offer incentives in exchange for reviews. Attempts to bring down the rating of a competitor by submitting a negative review will not be tolerated.</p>
<p><strong>Respect the privacy of others.</strong> Booking.com will make an effort to obscure email addresses, telephone numbers, website addresses, social media accounts, and other similar details.</p>
<p><strong>The opinions expressed in contributions are those of Booking.com customers and properties, and not of Booking.com. Booking.com does not accept responsibility or liability for any reviews or responses. Booking.com is a distributor (without any obligation to verify) and not a publisher of these comments and responses.</strong></p>
</div>

<div class="review_item_review_content">
<p class="review_neg"><i class="review_item_icon">눉</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">The receptionist was nice and was willing to help but since they don't deal with tourists more often, they lack information that is very helpful for tourists like us. They didn't have maps for the metro lines, though the receptionist printed something from her computer still it wasn't enough. The mini bar and shower in our room were not working but since we were only staying there for a night, we didn't bother complaining because we didn't want to be bothered transferring to another room. There was not that much choices for breakfast.</span></p><p class="review_pos"><i class="review_item_icon">눇</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">This hotel exceeded my expectation actually. I was looking for budget hotels since we went to Europe for backpacking (but we opted not to stay in dormitories), so I booked an overnight stay in this hotel. The room was spacious enough for me and my friend. The bed was very comfortable and there were some welcome drinks which were truly appreciated. It was also a walking distance from Polus City Center if you want to do some shopping, there is also a grocery store inside. It is also near the Tram Station (Polus City Center Station) where you can take tram number 4 and that will bring you to the Old Town.</span></p>

<p class="review_neg"><i class="review_item_icon">눉</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">Walking to the city center would take more than 30 minutes but there's a tram in close proximity and public transportation prices are considerably low. I consider the price a bit too high for Bratislava and given the fact that this hotel is not located in walking distance to the city center. However, I assume that new years eve had influence on the price.</span></p><p class="review_pos"><i class="review_item_icon">눇</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">The hotel is located in a quiet area with close proximity to public transportation (tram) and a  shopping center. Our room was clean and quiet. Free parking was possible in one of the streets. Selection of food for breakfast was good and enough.</span></p>

<div class="review_item_review_content">
<p class="review_neg"><i class="review_item_icon">눉</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">I did not like smoking in the cafe after 22.00.
However the food was delicious, restaurant was too much overpriced for 3star hotel - prices at level of Paris or Rome, or luxury restaurants in Prague...But to be fair - hotel management is giving its guests 30%discount voucher for main course - which improves a restaurant price perception a lot..Beside this - I strongly recommend this hotel for undemanding guests (maybe also for demanding guest:) - see positives.
</span></p><p class="review_pos"><i class="review_item_icon">눇</i><span itemprop="reviewBody">Almost everything (besides the minuses above) Quiet, comfy , spacious
and clean room.. Great value for money.
Very pleasant stuff both in the reception and as well as in the restaurant.Very good and tasty meal in the restaurant- I really did not expect such tasty quality food in 3star hotel.Reasonalbe priced parking.Good Wifi connection (however with speed drop off sometimes-but not too often)SUMMARY : GOOD CLEAN HOTEL, GREAT VALUE FOR MANY, FRIENDLY STUFF AND VERY GOOD (and overpriced:)  RESTAURANT.I will definitely come back and strongly recommed this hotel
</span></p>

<div id="revc_write_a_review_login_intro" style="display:none;">
<h3>Verified reviews from real guests.</h3><p>We have more than 70 million property reviews, and they're all from <strong>real, verified guests.</strong>
<div class="rlp-intro">
<div class="rlp-intro__container clearfix">
<h3 class="rlp-intro__title">How does it work?</h3>
<ul class="rlp-intro-how">
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--tickfull">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--tickfull">1</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-tickfull"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">It starts with a booking</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">The only way to leave a review is to first make a booking. That's how we know our reviews come from real guests who have stayed at the property.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--citytrip">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--citytrip">2</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-citytrip"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">Followed by a trip</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">When guests stay at the property, they check out how quiet the room is, how friendly the staff is, and more.</p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__arrow fl">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__arrow-icon bicon-rightchevron"></p>
</li>
<li class="rlp-intro-how__item fl">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__container rlp-intro-how__container--feedback">
<div class="rlp-intro-how__sub-container">
<p class="rlp-intro-how__num rlp-intro-how__num--feedback">3</p>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__icon bicon-feedback"></p>
</div>
</div>
<h4 class="rlp-intro-how__title">And finally, a review</h4>
<p class="rlp-intro-how__desc">After their trip, guests tell us about their stay. We check for naughty words and verify the authenticity of all guest reviews before adding them to our site.</p>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
</div>
<p>If you booked through us and want to leave a review, please sign in first.</p>
<div class="intro_footer">
<a href="https://secure.booking.com/reviewtimeline.html" class="revc_write_a_review_login_button">Sign in and leave a review</a>
</div>
</div>

Real stays. Real opinions. Read more Write a Review Booking.com Guest Review Guidelines To keep the rating score and review content relevant for your upcoming trip, we archive reviews older than 24 months. Only a customer who has booked through Booking.com and stayed at the property in question can write a review. This allows us to verify that our reviews come from real guests like you. Who better to tell others about the free breakfast, friendly staff, or their comfortable room than someone who’s stayed at the property? We want you to share your story, with both the good and the not-so-good. All we ask is that you follow a few simple guidelines. Reviews Vision We believe review contributions and property responses will highlight a wide range of opinions and experiences, which is critical in helping guests make informed decisions about where to stay. Reviews Principles Contributions to Booking.com are a reflection of the dedication of our guests and properties, so we treat them with the utmost respect. Whether negative or positive, we'll post every comment in full and as quickly as possible, provided the guidelines are met. We'll also provide transparency over the status of submitted content. We'll use the same guidelines and standards for all user-generated content, and for the property responses to that content. We'll allow the contributions to speak for themselves, and we won’t be the judge of reality. Booking.com’s role is to be a feedback distributor for both guests and properties. Guidelines and Standards for Reviews These guidelines and standards aim to keep the content on Booking.com relevant and family-friendly, without limiting expression or strong opinions. They're also applicable regardless of the comment's tone. Contributions should be travel related. The most helpful contributions are detailed and help others make better decisions. Please don’t include personal, political, ethical, or religious commentary. Promotional content will be removed and issues concerning Booking.com’s services should be routed to our Customer Service or Accommodation Service teams. Contributions should be appropriate for a global audience. Please avoid using profanity or attempts to approximate profanity with creative spelling, in any language. Comments and media that include hate speech, discriminatory remarks, threats, sexually explicit remarks, violence, or the promotion of illegal activity are not permitted. All content should be genuine and unique to the guest. Reviews are most valuable when they are original and unbiased. Your contribution should be yours. Booking.com property partners should not post on behalf of guests or offer incentives in exchange for reviews. Attempts to bring down the rating of a competitor by submitting a negative review will not be tolerated. Respect the privacy of others. Booking.com will make an effort to obscure email addresses, telephone numbers, website addresses, social media accounts, and other similar details. The opinions expressed in contributions are those of Booking.com customers and properties, and not of Booking.com. Booking.com does not accept responsibility or liability for any reviews or responses. Booking.com is a distributor (without any obligation to verify) and not a publisher of these comments and responses. Also, the breakfast is very very expensive. 눇 The room is clean and comfortable. All amenities needed are in it. Without it being small, it could be a little bit more spacious. November 3, 2017 Lucia Austria 4 Reviews 7.5 “ Easy reachable from the city ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 The windows would need some care - cleaning (however difficult reachable & part unopenable therefore somewhat a challenge to clean). The combined bath & toilette very nice however funny solution - toilett almost at the door despite really lot of space in bath, shower glas protecting from water landing outside bath tube was on the other side where no water came 🤔. 눇 Nice personal. Bed very comfortable. Breakfast really sufficient. Worth the price. November 2, 2017 Danica Slovakia 3 Reviews 7.9 “ Staff, restaurant downstairs, large bed. ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double Room with Extra Bed • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 I had a 2 year old with me. Wanted to give him a bath. There was only shower, though the pictures on booking.com were showing a bath tub. But the bottom of that shower was deeper, so i thought it would be a good option too. But it was not clean enough to bathe such a little child. I spent a looong time trying to clean it myself. That was not a good experience. 눇 Staff, restaurant downstairs, large bed. October 30, 2017 Nighter Slovakia 6 Reviews 7.5 “ Good value for money, good hotel, average experience. ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 3 nights 눉 The room wasnt clean enough to my expectations, bathroom however was nice and clean. 눇 Good value for money, good hotel, average experience. Good for short business trips or a quick city stay. October 22, 2017 Naome United Arab Emirates 4 Reviews 7.9 “ This hotel exceeded my expectation actually. ” • Leisure trip • Group • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 The receptionist was nice and was willing to help but since they don't deal with tourists more often, they lack information that is very helpful for tourists like us. They didn't have maps for the metro lines, though the receptionist printed something from her computer still it wasn't enough. The mini bar and shower in our room were not working but since we were only staying there for a night, we didn't bother complaining because we didn't want to be bothered transferring to another room. There was not that much choices for breakfast. 눇 This hotel exceeded my expectation actually. I was looking for budget hotels since we went to Europe for backpacking (but we opted not to stay in dormitories), so I booked an overnight stay in this hotel. The room was spacious enough for me and my friend. The bed was very comfortable and there were some welcome drinks which were truly appreciated. It was also a walking distance from Polus City Center if you want to do some shopping, there is also a grocery store inside. It is also near the Tram Station (Polus City Center Station) where you can take tram number 4 and that will bring you to the Old Town. October 6, 2017 Martin Slovakia 41 Reviews 10 “ - Nice clean rooms. ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room (1 Adult) • Stayed 1 night 눉 - Breakfast coffee was terrible. Espresso machine would be perfect. - Had problems with some lights on my room (but maybe I did something wrong). 눇 - Nice clean rooms. - This time also with a nice balcony. - Friendly staff. - Good breakfast. October 2, 2017 Luci Ja United Kingdom 13 Reviews 10 “ Booking changed no fuss - staff very friendly! ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 4 nights 눇 We actually had to change our booked dates, and even though it was one of the bookings that were originally not allowed to be changed, the staff were very helpful and made the changes (without a fee that I would probably have to pay had we changed this online) with no fuss at all, which I was impressed by! Looking forward to coming here during our new dates. September 18, 2017 Martin Latvia 12 Reviews 9.6 “ A comfortable room with a great view ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double Room with Extra Bed • Stayed 2 nights 눉 Small parking, open to the street (camera-guarded), about 30 mins by foot to the Old Town. 눇 Great breakfast, very comfortable rooms with views of Bratislava castle, stylish design September 11, 2017 Anonymous Turkey 8 Reviews 7.5 “ Nice hotel for short stays. ” • Business trip • Family with young children • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 3 nights 눉 There is no place to hang the showerhead, so it was so difficult to have a shower. September 11, 2017 Silviu Romania 31 Reviews 8.8 “ Great for an overnight stay in Bratislava ” • Business trip • Group • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night 눇 Very decent rooms. September 10, 2017 Diana Spain 16 Reviews 9.6 “ Great choice ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 If you book the room without breakfast and decide to hace breakfast there it's expensive (33% of the room rate for 2 people), although it's good and fresh made. 눇 The room was amazing, we got a last floor room with panoramic views, super comfi bed and shower, nice staff. January 4, 2017 Massimo Italy 12 Reviews 10 “ Great place to stay in Bratislava ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 All good 눇 The staff if very professional and welcoming! Pretty centrale, very clean, good breakfast. I would just make WiFi a bit stringer on the higher floors. November 13, 2016 Joelle United Kingdom 1 review 9.6 “ great location & breakfast ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room (1 Adult) • Stayed 7 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 walls seems to be quite thin and I was woken up by other guests coming home. but this can't be avoided, happens in any hotel. 눇 great location, short walk to Polus tower and Polus shopping centre. short walk to tram stop and 10 mins ride to town centre. big room and bathroom, tv with slovak, english and german channels. amazing choice of breakfast, high quality food November 11, 2016 Marius Romania 10 Reviews 5.0 “ I wouldn't book again. ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 3 nights 눉 There was a bad smell in the room. Wireless working bad from time to time. Internet cable connection didn't work at all. Poor breakfast. Small parking lot. Bad lightning in the room! 눇 The room looked nice. Close to a shopping mall (like 300m) with food courts, cinema. November 3, 2016 Robert Czech Republic 35 Reviews 8.8 “ Good clean hotel, great value, tasty food ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room (1 Adult) • Stayed 1 night 눉 I did not like smoking in the cafe after 22.00. However the food was delicious, restaurant was too much overpriced for 3star hotel - prices at level of Paris or Rome, or luxury restaurants in Prague...But to be fair - hotel management is giving its guests 30%discount voucher for main course - which improves a restaurant price perception a lot.. Beside this - I strongly recommend this hotel for undemanding guests (maybe also for demanding guest:) - see positives. 눇 Almost everything (besides the minuses above) Quiet, comfy , spacious and clean room.. Great value for money. Very pleasant stuff both in the reception and as well as in the restaurant. Very good and tasty meal in the restaurant- I really did not expect such tasty quality food in 3star hotel. Reasonalbe priced parking. Good Wifi connection (however with speed drop off sometimes-but not too often) SUMMARY : GOOD CLEAN HOTEL, GREAT VALUE FOR MANY, FRIENDLY STUFF AND VERY GOOD (and overpriced:) RESTAURANT. I will definitely come back and strongly recommed this hotel November 1, 2016 Maiia Abkhazia, Georgia 7 Reviews 9.2 “ Good food - good trip! ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 6 nights 눇 In this hotel really the best chef! Soups and meat dishes and desserts are perfect! The personal try to help you 24hours. This hotel a little be far from center, but the public transport and all things that I talking before make this place very good. thank you! October 28, 2016 Brian Canada 51 Reviews 9.2 “ Good value and Comfort! ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Air conditioning isn't effective. Breakfast room tight. On street parking. 눇 Nice room, good mattresses a and pillows clean bathroom. Padded doors to deaden sound from hallway. Frt desk sells tram tickets for old town and simple 2 block walk to catch tram 2. Good breakfast! October 21, 2016 Alison United Kingdom 1 review 4.2 “ Not as good as we hoped for! ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 3 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Shower over bath in a useless position. Bins were not emptied daily nor the floor vacuumed. Staff were not friendly and no tea making facilities in the room. No English breakfast tea in breakfast room 눇 Room was a good size and bed comfortable. October 16, 2016 Colin United Kingdom 33 Reviews 7.9 “ Value for money in Bratislava. ” • Leisure trip • Group • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 3 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Poor WiFi signal in most areas, including the room itself, and the restaurant/reception. 눇 Good quiet location, near to tram routes, and on a bus route. Very comfortable room, and a reasonable breakfast buffet. I would definitely use this hotel again! October 14, 2016 Gavin United Kingdom 10 Reviews 9.6 “ Fantastic ” • Leisure trip • Group • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 2 nights 눉 The only slightly problem was that the shower was low down on the wall and no good to me as i am 6 ft 4 plus no bath mat.So with no bath mat it was very slippy when trying to get out. 눇 The staff were great and very helpful.Ordered taxi`s for us when needed and helped us know more about bratislava.I will certainly use the hotel again if ever in bratislava. October 4, 2016 Jessfer United Kingdom 5 Reviews 5.8 “ LITERALLY THERE WAS NO AC IN OUR ROOM ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Literally there was no airconditioning unit in the room. Staff said they are using cooling ceiling tube to cool the room but it is very hot during night.We opened the window to get fresh air but it is too noisy from outside. I will not this recommended hotel. 눇 Comfort bed October 3, 2016 Evgeniia Russia Age group: 25 – 34 20 Reviews 5.4 “ Not bad ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 20 C in the room that didn't go higher =(, the additional blanket had a strange smell, not stable wi-fi connection 눇 Nice breakfast, helpfull staff. Location is Ok - 15 minutes to the old town by trolley. 30% discount in a restaurant October 2, 2016 Anonymous Czech Republic 10 Reviews 8.3 “ Very friendly and nice staff, good connection to city centre... ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 Partly unpaited ceiling, lamp was not working 눇 Very friendly and nice staff, good connection to city centre by tram (approx 15 minutes) and taxi at night from centre costs 5 EUR Perfect breakfast September 28, 2016 Ksenia Russia 8 Reviews 7.5 “ This hotel is a good correlation between quality and price. ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Comfort Double Room with Bath • Stayed 2 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 It was not possible to fix shower in the upper position and there was no shower curtain in my room, which was quite inconvenient. Food at the breakfast was mostly quite fat 눇 This hotel is a good correlation between quality and price. My room was spacious and comfortable. Hotel is located very close to the shopping center and not very far away from the city center, where you can easily get by tram September 27, 2016 Heinrich Germany 27 Reviews 9.6 “ Ideal place for tourists ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 2 nights 눉 None in my opinion. 눇 New, modern building with large, comfortable room. Generous breakfast, friendly and helpful staff. Location Close to Shopping ceter and to public transport into town center. September 27, 2016 Daria Russia 17 Reviews 10 “ We liked everything! ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 2 nights 눉 The internet was slow in the room, but very fast in the lobby. 눇 We liked everything! Very comfortable and clean room, great bathroom, perfect breakfast, nice interior, helpful staff, good location, free parking near the site :) don't miss out the homeopatic pharmacy on the other side of the road! September 19, 2016 Martin Slovakia 41 Reviews 10 “ Best value for money in Bratislava ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room (1 Adult) • Stayed 2 nights 눉 - The internet could be faster and more stable. - There was some kind of birthday party in the evening, so the restaurant was full. - Charging 10 euros per day for parking is pretty much, as there is free parking on the street possible. I was also parking outside. 눇 - Very nice and big rooms (business room). - Very good breakfast and a good restaurant also for dinner. - Near Polus city center. - Probably the best value for money in Bratislava for business travellers. September 18, 2016 Radek Poland 10 Reviews 10 “ 1 night in Bratislava ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night 눇 came just before the closing of a restaurant in hotel -> still managed to eat and the food was awsome. the service was very helpful. the rest was as you would expect August 26, 2016 Brian Ireland 101 Reviews 9.2 “ Really nice staff, safe parking and a quiet location. ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 The city, which is not the hotel's fault! 눇 Really nice staff, safe parking and a quiet location. Not that far from centre and clean rooms. Price reasonable. August 14, 2016 Nicholas United Kingdom Age group: 25 – 34 31 Reviews 4.2 “ Go elsewhere ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double Room with Extra Bed • Stayed 2 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Staff weren't overly friendly and the room was frankly dirty with someone's socks under the bed and used cotton buds behind the tv. Find somewhere else to stay. 눇 Easy to find and parking was good. Not far from shopping centre and tram to centre August 7, 2016 Salim Slovakia 15 Reviews 9.6 “ Good location with an easy access to both bus and tram stop... ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눇 Good location with an easy access to both bus and tram stop and located in a nice environment, nice and spacious room with an excellent bed, the breakfast was nice and there were plenty of options to choose from, staff was nice and friendly, easy to find a free parking for the car, very good value, highly recommended and I will definitely visit the hotel again :-) August 4, 2016 Anonymous Czech Republic 1 review 6.7 “ Average but overpriced, especially the food. ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room (1 Adult) • Stayed 3 nights 눉 I wanted to pay breakfast but the price seemed unreasonable high. I tried it the last day there though and for that money I would expect at least fresh bread and fresh fruit. The wifi was disconnecting all the time. The overall speed was good but there were times when I just couldn't connect. Bring a cable. The last day my door lock stopped working and the receptionist had to open for me every time I was going in. It was fortunate that I was to leave the next day because waiting for 15 minutes for the receptionist to show up at 10pm when I was returning from a meeting was not nice. 눇 The employees were very nice, polite and always smiling. August 2, 2016 Roman Russia 11 Reviews 8.8 “ Highly recommended ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 1 night 눉 location 눇 Very cosy. Interior is perfect as well as exterior. Large and comfortable bed. Chose it because of design and clearness. Close to large shopping mall. Parking at the internal yard. July 27, 2016 Kamila Slovakia 6 Reviews 5.8 “ Location ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Comfort Double Room with Bath • Stayed 1 night • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Cleanliness in the bathroom - hair in the drain in the bathtub = very disgusting. Closed restaurant :-( after a long way with a little baby we had to find any restaurant somewhere in hotel location. 눇 Location Room with a baby cot July 24, 2016 Anonymous Japan 52 Reviews 5.0 “ Very inconvenient for a traveler. ” • Leisure trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room (1 Adult) • Stayed 2 nights 눉 Location ( It's necessary to go to the tram station by 5 minutes on foot and take a tram for 15 minutes to the Old Town.) Very slow internet connection. July 13, 2016 David United Kingdom 2 Reviews 5.4 “ The sun also rises- and there are no curtains! ” • Business trip • Group • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 3 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 There are no curtains!!! The sun shines you right in the eyes. Sleeping after sunrise is a challenge. Staff do not replenish shower gel or hand soap. 눇 Nice breakfast. Helpful and friendly staff. July 11, 2016 David Czech Republic 2 Reviews 10 “ 2 days family stay ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double Room with Extra Bed • Stayed 2 nights 눉 Wi-fi connection on the room was quite poor and slow but I luckily had LAN cable for wired one which worked perfectly. 눇 Very kind personnel, good and big breakfast, clean room with new equipment, close to shopping mall and tram to the city center, no problem with free parking, some toys for children at reception. I can only recommend this hotel for stay in Bratislava. July 11, 2016 Antonio Italy 14 Reviews 8.8 “ Style and forniture very pleasant ” • Business trip • Solo traveler • Double or Twin Room (1 Adult) • Stayed 1 night 눉 Internet connection wifi was very weak in the room but they had a cable to connect the laptop. Breakfast not so great 눇 Style and forniture very pleasant July 9, 2016 Anonymous Belgium 15 Reviews 7.1 “ Good location and nice room ” • Leisure trip • Family with young children • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 3 nights • Submitted from a mobile device 눉 Cooling system was broken for several days, but they did offer a discount. They are trying to be a 4 star hotel, but are not quite succeeding with most of their efforts. 눇 Good location and nice room July 3, 2016 Mihai Romania 8 Reviews 9.6 “ Nice hotel in quiet neighborhood ” • Leisure trip • Couple • Double or Twin Room • Stayed 2 nights 눉 Sunday evening the restaurant is closed and we were not informed about it. Small parking lot but you can find parking on the streets nearby. Located quite far from the center of the city. 눇 Nice clean room, nice staff, very good breakfast. Quiet neighborhood.
